DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic, Therapeutic, or Research Equipment Medical Device Model Name
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The model name of the diagnostic, therapeutic or research equipment model used during a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Device Identifiers Domain Diagnostic, Therapeutic, or Research Equipment Medical Device Model
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to device identifiers._A manufactured object that is used to perform diagnostic, therapeutic or research activities._Any physical object that is useful for prevention, diagnosis, monitoring, or treatment of disease or other conditions._A style or design of an item.
